alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 1:49PM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 5500 feet, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 16 inches. Winds gusting 40 to 50 mph late tonight into Sunday morning. For the Winter Storm Watch above 5500 feet, heavy snow possible. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 15 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Forest Lakes and Heber- Overgaard. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from midnight Tonight to 5 PM Sunday: Forest Lakes 10 to 16 inches Heber-Overgaard 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
